about_the_game:
REDVERY SPACE: An immersive space flight simulation

Into the unknown

A newly discovered wormhole at the edge of our solar system could lead to uncharted space, rich with resources and unknown phenomena. Probes have failed to return, leaving vital questions unanswered. The anomaly’s instability requires a skilled pilot for further exploration.

Your mission

Over the last decade, we have designed REDVERY RX3, a cutting-edge spacecraft optimized for deep space exploration. Your mission: Explore the universe, find shortcuts in wormholes, document discoveries, and, if possible, return with critical data.

Explore the universe your way

It's an open world. You’ll navigate solar systems, manage limited resources, and adapt to unpredictable challenges. Every decision matters. Success depends on your ingenuity and courage. Are you ready to venture into the unknown?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sequoia
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro | Apple M2 Pro | Apple M3 | Apple M4
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon R7 M460
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Pilot the RX3, a state-of-the-art spacecraft, in this immersive space flight simulator. Master precise controls, explore uncharted space, and uncover ancient alien technology. Designed for fans of realistic space simulations, with full H.O.T.A.S. and controller support.
